root.name: The Sims 2: Glamour Life Stuff
root.description: Overview "Stuff Packs" for The Sims 2 are collections of new clothing, decorations, furniture, and other miscellaneous items assembled around a particular theme. Unlike the major expansion packs which focus on introducing new gameplay mechanics, these discount priced add-ins seek to supplement existing features by adding more aesthetic variety. Glamour Life Stuff was the second such content addition to be released, and includes a number of decorations, floor and wall textures, and fancy clothing options for sims who want to show off their sense of high culture and sophistication. Two new premade, vacant homes are also added to the lot bin where players can manually import them into an existing neighborhood.
